arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) assigned by AWS to this Workforce.

cognitoConfig.description: Use this parameter to configure an Amazon Cognito private workforce. A single Cognito workforce is created using and corresponds to a single Amazon Cognito user pool. Conflicts with `oidc_config`. see Cognito Config details below.

oidcConfig.description: Use this parameter to configure a private workforce using your own OIDC Identity Provider. Conflicts with `cognito_config`. see OIDC Config details below.

sourceIpConfig.description: A list of IP address ranges Used to create an allow list of IP addresses for a private workforce. By default, a workforce isn't restricted to specific IP addresses. see Source Ip Config details below.

subdomain.description:
The subdomain for your OIDC Identity Provider.
* `workforce_vpc_config.0.vpc_endpoint_id` - The IDs for the VPC service endpoints of your VPC workforce.

workforceName.description: The name of the Workforce (must be unique).

workforceVpcConfig.description: configure a workforce using VPC. see Workforce VPC Config details below.

cognitoConfig.description: Use this parameter to configure an Amazon Cognito private workforce. A single Cognito workforce is created using and corresponds to a single Amazon Cognito user pool. Conflicts with `oidc_config`. see Cognito Config details below.

oidcConfig.description: Use this parameter to configure a private workforce using your own OIDC Identity Provider. Conflicts with `cognito_config`. see OIDC Config details below.

sourceIpConfig.description: A list of IP address ranges Used to create an allow list of IP addresses for a private workforce. By default, a workforce isn't restricted to specific IP addresses. see Source Ip Config details below.

workforceName.description: The name of the Workforce (must be unique).

workforceVpcConfig.description: configure a workforce using VPC. see Workforce VPC Config details below.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering Workforce resources.

* `workforce_vpc_config.0.vpc_endpoint_id` - The IDs for the VPC service endpoints of your VPC workforce.
